Method Detail

list

public java.util.List list(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                           java.lang.String channelLabel)
                    throws FaultException
List the organizations associated with the given channel that may be trusted.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
channelLabel - The label for the channel
Returns:
List of map entries indicating the orgs available and if access is enabled.
Throws:
FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if: - The sessionKey is invalid - The channelLabel is invalid - The user doesn't have channel admin permissions

enableAccess

public int enableAccess(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                        java.lang.String channelLabel,
                        java.lang.Integer orgId)
                 throws FaultException
Enable access to the channel for the given organization.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
channelLabel - The label for the channel to change
orgId - The org id being granted access.
Returns:
Returns 1 if successful, exception otherwise
Throws:
FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if: - The sessionkey is invalid - The channel label is invalid - The org id is invalid - The user doesn't have channel admin permissions

disableAccess

public int disableAccess(java.lang.String sessionKey,
                         java.lang.String channelLabel,
                         java.lang.Integer orgId)
                  throws FaultException
Disable access to the channel for the given organization.

Parameters:
sessionKey - The sessionKey containing the logged in user
channelLabel - The label for the channel to change
orgId - The org id being removed access.
Returns:
Returns 1 if successful, exception otherwise
Throws:
FaultException - A FaultException is thrown if: - The sessionkey is invalid - The channel label is invalid - The org id is invalid - The user doesn't have channel admin permissions
